GSD.product_version: versions from v3.10 to before v5.18.8
GSD.description:
ARM: cns3xxx: Fix refcount leak in cns3xxx_init

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.8 by commit dc5170aae24e04068fd5ea125d06c0ab51f48a27, it was introduced in version v3.10 by commit 415f59142d9d9dd023deaeb3b4dfc1aecdd3983c. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ARM: cns3xxx: Fix refcount leak in cns3xxx_init
